thread.title: Ground News - Popular Lawrence restaurant to be demolished after fire
thread.title_full: Ground News - Popular Lawrence restaurant to be demolished after fire

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Popular Lawrence restaurant to be demolished after fire
text:
Summary by Ground News The roof and floors of the Cielito Lindo Mexican restaurant collapsed. One firefighter suffered a minor injury while fighting the fire. The historic building, built in 1976, caught fire late Dec. 13. City crews set up various fencing and barricades around the area. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Fox 4 Kansas City Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Popular Lawrence restaurant to be demolished after fire LAWRENCE, Kan. -- Crews will demolish a popular Lawrence restaurant after it was heavily damaged in a fire earlier this month. The Lawrence Historic Resources Commission unanimously voted Dec. 21 to approve the demolition of the Cielito Lindo Mexican restaurant on New Hampshire Street due to its unsafe condition.
